inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed supratentorial anaplastic astrocytoma or glioblastoma
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine, but it's not specified as supratentorial.

exclusion.criterion: Serious medical or neurological condition with a poor prognosis
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient has severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention, indicating a serious medical condition.

notes: Karnofsky performance score is unknown. Patient's medical condition may trigger exclusion criteria.
